remarks: The carry sequence is a sequence of elements of ` 2o ` encoding a "sequence of wffs".  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2016.)
statement:

sadval.b $e |- ( ph -> B C_ NN0 ) $.
sadval.c $e |- C = seq 0 ( ( c e. 2o , m e. NN0 |-> if ( cadd ( m e. A , m e. B , (/) e. c ) , 1o , (/) ) ) , ( n e. NN0 |-> if ( n = 0 , (/) , ( n - 1 ) ) ) ) $.
sadcf $p |- ( ph -> C : NN0 --> 2o ) $.
$d A c m $.
$d B c m $.
$d c m n $.
